A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed TFA it really made me believe SW was back!  I couldn't really understand why JJ was not back for this one but I saw Looper really enjoyed this film and thought TLJ was in good hands but little did I know that TLJ would wipe the fan boy jiz from my eyes and slap me in the face.
